message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to the game!
Let's meet in the middle, no need to be greedy!
You said meet in the middle, but I can do better than that!
You're getting desperate, but I'll give you a slight edge this time!
Time to take control of the game!
I'm not giving up yet, take a smaller share!
Time to make a bold move!
I'm taking a risk, but I'll give you a tiny share!
I'll take the risk, all or nothing!
